inclusion.criterion: University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences (UAMS) and Obstetrix Medical Group, in California)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presenting for anticipated induction of labor or spontaneous labor (regular contractions for more than 2 hours), but cervical dilation less than 4 cm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Expected to deliver at one of the participating hospitals
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Autoimmune disorders (antiphospholipid antibody, lupus, rheumatoid arthritis, scleroderma)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Enrollment in another randomized clinical trial
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Hematologic disorders (coagulation defects, sickle cell disease, thrombocytopenia, thrombophilia)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Hypertension (chronic or pregnancy induced) before randomization
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any contraindications to vaginal delivery (breech, active herpes, schedule cesarean, abnormal fetal heart tracing)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Pt is a 22yo F otherwise healthy with a 5 yr history of systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia concerning for another flare. She responded well to IV steroids and diphenydramine.
